channel.title: Coding on Andrea Rau, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Andrea Rau, PhD

item.title: R software packages
item.description: rpl: Randomized pairwise likelihood method for complex statistical inferences, available at GitHub padma: Pathway deviation scores using multiple factor analysis, available at BioC maskmeans: Multi-view aggregation/splitting K-means clustering algorithm, available at GitHub coseq: Co-expression analysis of sequencing data, available at BioC ICAL: Model selection for model based clustering of annotated data, available at GitHub metaRNASeq: Meta-analysis of RNA-seq data, available at CRAN HTSDiff: Differential analysis for RNA-seq data, available at R-Forge HTSFilter: Filter for replicated high-throughput sequencing data, available at BioC HTSCluster: Clustering high-throughput sequencing data with Poisson mixture models, available at CRAN ebdbNet: Empirical Bayes estimation for dynamic Bayesian networks, available at CRAN

item.title: Shiny apps
item.description: Regeneration Rosetta: An R/Shiny interactive web application to explore regeneration-associated gene expression and chromatin accessibility, available as a Shiny web app Edge in TCGA: An R/Shiny interactive web application for the exploration of drivers of gene expression in The Cancer Genome Atlas, available as a Shiny web app Invest Astuces: An R/Shiny interactive web application for financial and real estate loan simulations, available as a Shiny web app
